Introduction

Pocket Girls (Korean: 포켓걸스) debuted as a 4 member group on April 10, 2015 with the song "Bbang, Bbang" The original lineup consisted of Sea, Soyoon, Yeonji and Jua. They ended up adding and losing members, in departure of ten members.
